text: Master of scandals, dispenser of the benefits of crime, steward of the sumptuous sins and great vices, over-admirable legacy of false mischief, sovereign of contempt, reckoner of humiliations, owner of old hatreds, hope of virility, anguish of empty wombs, tutor of strident neurosis, tower of pomp of hysteria, bloodstained vessel of rapes. FIN
title: Satán
author: Joris-Karl Huysmans
